content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 28), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母はマップ左上(3,3)近傍のランダム位置にいるため、まずは航空部隊を発艦して広範囲に索敵を行う。空母は敵に近づきすぎず、発艦可能範囲内で索敵効果を最大化するため、空母は少し北西方向に移動させる。航空部隊BSQ1は敵空母の可能性が高い左上方向の遠方(5,5)付近を索敵し、BSQ2はやや右寄りの(10,5)付近を索敵させる。これにより敵空母の位置特定を目指す。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 25, "y": 26}, "launch_target": {"x": 5, "y": 5}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=5 y=5 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=13 y=11.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "航空部隊の航続距離は22ヘクス以内なので、空母(25,26)から距離22以内の索敵目標を再設定する。敵空母は左上(3,3)近傍にいるため、空母から見て北西方向の最大索敵範囲内の(13,11)付近をBSQ1の索敵目標とする。BSQ2はやや右寄りの(15,10)付近を索敵目標とし、広範囲索敵を行う。空母は引き続き北西方向へ移動し索敵効果を高める。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 25, "y": 26}, "launch_target": {"x": 13, "y": 11}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (13, 11) while at (25, 26).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (25, 27), en route to target (25, 26), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (25, 26), outbound toward (13, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "空母は現在北西方向に移動中で、BSQ1は索敵中。BSQ2を発艦し、敵空母の可能性が高い左上方向の別のポイント(15,10)へ索敵に向かわせる。空母は引き続き安全圏を保ちつつ北西へ移動を続け、索敵範囲を広げる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 24, "y": 25}, "launch_target": {"x": 15, "y": 10}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (15, 10) while at (24, 24).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (24, 25), en route to target (24, 25), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (23, 22), outbound toward (13, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (24, 24), outbound toward (15, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "空母は安全に北西方向へ移動を続け、索敵範囲を広げる。BSQ1とBSQ2はそれぞれの目標地点に向かい索敵中。敵空母の発見に備え、空母の位置を慎重に調整しつつ、敵の動きを観察する。現時点では新たな発艦はせず、既存の航空部隊の索敵に集中する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 23, "y": 24}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (23, 24), en route to target (23, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (21, 18), outbound toward (13, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (22, 20), outbound toward (15, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "空母は引き続き北西方向へ移動し索敵範囲を拡大。BSQ1とBSQ2はそれぞれの目標地点に近づいているため、敵空母発見の可能性が高まっている。敵発見の報告がないため、次ターン以降も索敵継続。空母は安全圏を維持しつつ、索敵効果を最大化するために少しずつ北西へ移動を続ける。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 22, "y": 23}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (14, 14) while at (19, 14).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (14, 14) (previously at (14, 14)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (22, 23), en route to target (22, 23), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (19, 14), outbound toward (13, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (20, 16), outbound toward (15, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵航空部隊ASQ1をBSQ1が発見した。敵空母の位置は不明だが、敵機の位置から敵空母は近隣にいる可能性が高い。BSQ1は敵機を攻撃可能な位置に向かわせ、BSQ2も支援のため敵機の近く(14,14)に向かわせる。空母は敵の索敵圏外に留まりつつ、敵空母の位置推定のため北西方向に慎重に移動を続ける。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 21, "y": 22}, "launch_target": {"x": 14, "y": 14}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "現在、全ての航空部隊は発艦中であり、新たな発艦指示はできない。敵航空部隊を発見したため、BSQ1は攻撃を継続し、BSQ2も敵機の近くで索敵・支援を続ける。空母は安全圏を保ちつつ北西方向へ移動を続け、敵空母の位置特定を目指す。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 21, "y": 22}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (18, 12), outbound toward (15, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵航空部隊ASQ1は(17,16)に移動している。BSQ1とBSQ2は敵機を追跡しつつ索敵を続けているが、敵空母の位置は依然不明。空母は安全圏を維持しつつ、敵機の動きから敵空母の位置を推定するために北西方向への移動を継続する。新たな発艦指示は不要。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 20, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}
